name: uwu im a cultist
description:
uWu I'm a Cultist was made for Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme Duality

Description
uWu I'm a Cultist is a 2D top down game where you play as a cute cultist that is preparing a ritual.

During the day you will befriend your neighbours by giving them gifts while during the night you will be preparing the ingredients needed for the ritual.

Each day you will get a hint on which neighbour you need to befriend for the ritual. Each run will be different! Try to guess and befriend them before the ritual takes place!

Credits
Art  by Maru Silveira , Nico de Leon & Franco Zucci
Audio by Martin García de Zúñiga
Programming by Mak, Agus & jvolonte
